value.title: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry
value.content: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry.

value.title: Microsoft’s Nadella wants us to stop thinking of AI as ‘slop’
value.content: Nadella wants us to think of AI as a human helper instead of a slop-generating job killer. New data for 2026 indicates he could be right.

value.title: This is Uber’s new robotaxi from Lucid and Nuro
value.content: The production-intent version, unveiled at CES 2026 on Monday, will be an exceptionally roomy entry into the growing robotaxi market later this year.

value.title: Nvidia wants to be the Android of generalist robotics
value.content: Nvidia unveiled a full-stack robotics ecosystem at CES 2026, including foundation models, simulation tools, and hardware. It wants to be the default platform for robotics.

value.title: Nvidia launches powerful new Rubin chip architecture
value.content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang officially launched the company’s new Rubin computing architecture, which he described as the state of the art in AI computing.

value.title: Boston Dynamics’ next-gen humanoid robot will have Google DeepMind DNA
value.content: Google's AI research lab is working with Boston Dynamics to make Atlas act more like a human.

value.title: Nvidia launches Alpamayo, open AI models that allow autonomous vehicles to ‘think like a human’
value.content: Nvidia unveiled Alpamayo at CES 2026, which includes a reasoning vision language action model that allows an autonomous vehicle to think more like a human and provide chain-of-thought reasoning.

value.title: Lego Smart Bricks introduce a new way to build — and they don’t require screens
value.content: Lego developed a custom ASIC chip that allows its new Ssmart Bricks to pick up on signals from surrounding Smart Tags that dictate how it should make sounds or light up.

value.title: Hacktivist deletes white supremacist websites live onstage during hacker conference
value.content: A hacker known as Martha Root broke in and deleted three white supremacist websites at the end of a talk during the annual hacker conference Chaos Communication Congress in Germany.

value.title: Offshore wind developers sue Trump administration for halting $25B in projects
value.content: The lawsuits seek to reverse the Department of the Interior's stop-work order, which affected five offshore wind projects off the Eastern Seaboard.

value.title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
value.content: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player after Luminar's bankruptcy.

value.title: The 2026 BMW iX3 voice assistant will be powered by Alexa+
value.content: The launch is one part of Amazon's effort to bring its LLM-powered voice and digital assistant to every device — whether handheld or in the driver's seat — touched by consumers.

value.title: Lucid Motors doubled EV output in 2025 after early Gravity SUV struggles
value.content: Lucid built more than 18,000 EVs in 2025 and delivered more than 15,000 after a tough start to the year -- still a far cry from the high bar it set in 2021.

value.title: Amazon revamps Fire TV, launches its own ‘Artline’ televisions with frames at CES
value.content: Fire TV's new interface focuses on your content and offers easier, speedier navigation, Amazon says.

value.title: Amazon’s AI assistant comes to the web with Alexa.com
value.content: Amazon is bringing Alexa+ to the web with a new Alexa.com site, expanding its AI assistant beyond devices and positioning it as a family-focused, agent-style chatbot.

value.title: Google previews new Gemini features for TV at CES 2026
value.content: Google TV will let you ask Gemini to find and edit your photos, adjust your TV settings, and more.

value.title: LG’s new OLED TV is just 9mm thick
value.content: This year LG is showing off its manufacturing chops at CES with a new Wallpaper OLED TV that is just 9mm thick.

value.title: Luminar claims founder Austin Russell is dodging a subpoena in the bankruptcy case
value.content: The Luminar founder claims he has been cooperative.

value.title: Teradar reveals its first terahertz-band vision sensor for cars
value.content: The company is tapping the terahertz band of the electromagnetic spectrum to bring out the best qualities of more common lidar and radar sensors.

value.title: Kodiak taps Bosch to scale its self-driving truck tech
value.content: There is no timeline for when these systems will become available. But once they do, Kodiak could bring its tech to more trucks, faster.
